name: Saikyou Ginsei Shogi
overview: Seven unique rich players become players' opponents, and you can enjoy from beginners to advanced users with a wide range of strengths from 10th to 4th. For beginners, it has a wealth of functions for enjoying playing games such as safe hint function, game record playing function that can be used for research, editing function on board. With the game record storage function that can store up to 10 game data, you can also interrupt the game during the game and save the game record for studying the game.
